conbody.p: Select FileTeacher settings from the menu to change settings for the current teacher account.

A teacher settings window ( ) will appear on your screen, where you can set parameters for a new lesson. Check the Start new lesson automatically box if you would like to start a new lesson upon successful login without having to start it manually via the Logbook menu.
In this window you can enter your lesson duration, set a warning before the lesson end and set maximum score for the lesson.

If you check the Warn about lesson end box, Dialog Nibelung will issue a reminder to the students at the set time to the end of the lesson. The countdown clock in your status line ( ) will also change to red at the same time.
conbody.note: Please note that these settings will only be in effect for a new lesson.
conbody.p: Here you can also set default homepage for the lesson (see section ).
